headline: Boston Scientific Corporation (BSX): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Boston Scientific Corporation on Value investing subreddit by Infinite_Spinach8839. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on BSX. Boston Scientific Corporation’s share was trading at $99.02 as of December 2nd. BSX’s trailing and forward P/E were 54.02 and 29.15 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Boston Scientific Corporation develops, manufactures, and […]

headline: GEHC Forms 7-Year Care Alliance to Advance URMC Imaging & Monitoring
summary: GE HealthCare's seven-year alliance with URMC advances imaging, precision medicine and system-wide monitoring upgrades across UR Medicine.

headline: Has Boston Scientific’s Strong Runway in Minimally Invasive Therapies Stretched Its Valuation?
summary: Wondering if Boston Scientific is still a smart buy at these levels, or if most of the upside has already been priced in? Here is a closer look at what the market might be missing about its value. The stock has cooled off recently, slipping about 3.2% over the last week and 1.1% over the past month, but it is still up 9.3% year to date and 7.9% over the last year, with a 111.0% gain over three years and 187.4% over five years. Those moves have come alongside a steady stream of headlines...
